page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: IN THE VILLAGE OF WEST TANFIELD, MR. JOBLING CARRIES OUT HIS TRADE OF JOINER AND LOCAL CRAFTSMAN. HE SET UP IN BUSINESS ABOUT 9 YEARS AGO IN AN OLD BARN WHICH HE CONVERTED INTO A JOINERY WORKSHOP.BESIDES THE USUAL HOUSEHOLD OBJECTS OF DOORS,WINDOWS, TABLES AND CHAIRS,HE MAKES A WIDE VARIETY OF GARDEN FURNITURE,GARDEN GATES,CLIMBING FRAMES,SLIDES AND OTHER CHILDREN'S PLAY THINGS.THE WOODS HE USES ARE NATURAL PINE,IROKO,ELM, MAHOGANY AND OAK,THESE HE OBTAINS FROM HULL,HARTLEPOOL AND DARLINGTON.THE GOODS HE MAKES ARE BOUGHT BY LOCAL PEOPLE AND TOURISTS,WHO VISIT THE VILLAGE AND ARE SENT ALL OVER THE BRITISH ISLES AND TO THE CONTINENT. BESIDES HIS WOODEN OBJECTS,HE SELLS CALOR GAS AND PARAFFIN,AND REPAIRS DOORS,ROOFS AND WINDOWS FOR LOCAL PEOPLE IN THEIR HOMES.
